ComicInfo.Summary:
Judge Anderson escapes the demon world with help from Judge Walters.
A boy puts in a horror video and becomes part of it
Rambo parody.
An artist named Kenny Who? comes to Mega City to apply for a job as a comic artist but runs into obstacles.
Clinton Briscoe receives a letter from Micky Swift, from 1000 years in the future.
